ygData.subject: Re: Feign Death
ygData.msgSnippet: I would suggest you check out this message board. http://server3.ezboard.com/feverquestmonksfeigndeathnerf also with the patch messagelast night they did admit
ygData.messageBody:
I would suggest you check out this message board.

http://server3.ezboard.com/feverquestmonksfeigndeathnerf

also with the patch messagelast night they did admit to changes in FD but it
is still nerfed where it matter the most. and that is the higher levels.

----- Original Message -----
From: Scott Hueseman <shueseman@...>
To: <EQ-Monks@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, November 17, 1999 6:52 AM
Subject: Re: [EQ-Monks] Feign Death


> From: "Scott Hueseman" <shueseman@...>
>
> I feigned quite a bit last night in Mistmoore, and never had stuff come
back
> at me unless it was aggro'd by someone else.
>
> Larn, 35th armadillo, Brell
>
